Nightlight::

Nightlight transformed to her robot mode and walked towards 
Denzu "Let me explain you, Denzu, why are maximals here and a little 
about our race's history"

She started to tell him about Cybertron, the Great War, about 
maximals and predacons factions all about Beast Wars and how seemed 
that some pods (with alive protophorms ) might be alive in this 
planet.

"That's all I know about us" replied Nightlight


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Gimliyotoden@a... wrote:
> "Yeah, I think I get it" he claims, bu in reality, his starts a 
whole new 
> thinkin process, he begins to remember Cybertron. Why he came to 
thi planet, 
> his duties, but there is still a malfunction, what side was he 
on? "I thank 
> you so very much, now, will you explain to me the purpose of the 
Maximals?"
